title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Science Laboratory Class Design: Dick and Carey Model

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge at the middle school level and understanding of experimental procedures
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Explain the purpose and procedures of scientific experiments step-by-step
Collect experimental data while adhering to safety protocols in a virtual laboratory environment
Analyze collected data to derive scientific conclusions and present them in report format
Propose improvements to experimental designs through peer evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
